title: Loma: A MacIver Kid Adventure
description: Get ready for an exciting journey of self-discovery and wonder with The MacIver Kids Adventures series. The MacIver family, a Scottish couple who have adopted 10 diverse children, live in a small town in Canada, making them already unique. However, as the series begins, the children are in for a surprise as they uncover secrets and abilities that make them stand out even more. Disabilities and different abilities are strengths in this family. The children are led by Allen, a determined child in a wheelchair who doesn't let his need for a wheelchair hold him back. Follow the MacIver kids as they embark on an adventure that leads them to discover themselves, their family, and an extraordinary mystery in their hometown. This is the first book in a series of captivating stories that will leave you wanting more.
author: Lawrence Nault
